task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client - Bug Fix: App crashes when clicking the upload button without selecting a file but filled name and description
description:
Summary:

Without selecting a file when upload is pressed, the app crashes.

Steps to reproduce:

Select any Client-> Three dots -> Documents -> + sign-> fill name and description -> Click upload

OR

Select any Client-> Three dots ->Click any existing document -> Click Update Document -> Click upload

Expected behaviour:

Upload should not happen

Observed behaviour:

App Crash

Device and Android version:

Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime(Nougat 7.0) stock rom
